title: Dictate a Radiology Report
description: A radiologist has reviewed a patient's CT scan and needs to dictate their findings.

tasks.description: Select the patient's CT exam from the worklist in the RIS/PACS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Radiologist opens the correct exam images and report template.

tasks.description: Use voice recognition software to dictate the 'Findings' and 'Impression' sections of the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The radiologist's spoken words are converted to text in the report.

tasks.description: Review the dictated text for accuracy and electronically sign the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final report is created and sent to the patient's EHR for the ordering provider to see.
